reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater cute and well-made, with one mentioning it looks almost hand-dyed.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great winter sweater
items.body: Definitely not "ugly". Bought the green print and I love it. True to size but be aware the fit is relaxed. Well made, good quality, washes well and maintains its shape when air dried on a flat service. Read more
items.author: tassel1

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Knitted good / tight knit & warm
items.body: It’s nice and warm . Good quality Read more
items.author: LV

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A pretty good Christmas sweater
items.body: Cute and comfortable fabric. Fits true to size. Maybe slightly long but no other complaints Read more
items.author: Westcoastbias

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, Comfortable, and Pretty. Just Like Photo.
items.body: Soft and comfortable. Looks just like photo (color & pattern). I purchased the white with red color block snowflake pattern in a medium. It was a little bit bigger but not by much. Nice comfy fit. Felt great. No itching at all. Nice soft fabric. Also the red is the red of the photo, not too bright. Good buy. I would recommend this brand over other brands for this sweater. Read more
items.author: Tamara Malone

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs large- see review for measurements
items.body: This is my second review as I’ve just had to try buying it again to get the right fit. I really think the sizing chart is off but you be the judge: I’m 5’7, 145lb 35/33/37 ish. I originally ordered a large because I wanted to ensure a relaxed fit but it was really big and I gave it to my Mom and ordered a medium one for myself. It got here today but it’s still quite large. I’m returning for a small. Other than not having it to wear to a planned event because of returns, items ok. It’s pretty and not too thin or too bulky. I loved the length and the neck. It’s not a choking feeling wearing it. I’m hoping the small will FINALLY do the trick and fit me a bit better but still look relaxed. It’s just odd that, as a solid “medium” wearer, I’d need a small - especially odd because I want a loose fit. Just be aware. For now I’m posting a pic of the medium-sorry about the pj bottoms but I was so excited when I got it- then so bummed at the size. Read more
items.author: M

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Trust the size chart
items.body: Really nice sweater, I didn’t find it itchy or uncomfortable at all. Due to a lot of reviews suggesting to “size up” I got a size S, but I should have listened to the size chart and gone with an XS because it was definitely big on me, for reference I am 5’0” and 100lbs. Read more
items.author: Alyssa Hanson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Talla grande
items.body: Pedí talla S y siempre es grandecito. La tela es buena no muuy suave pero tampoco pica. Read more
items.author: Mariana Restrepo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nothing Ugly Here!
items.body: Super cute Christmas sweater! Looks just like the images and is true to size. I’m 5’7” and wear a size 10 and I got an XL a Large would have been fine too. I wanted more of an oversized fit and a little bit more length. I really like the color and pattern. You can wear it throughout winter and not just to an ugly Christmas sweater party. So more bang for your buck. The knit is nice and thick and not itchy. Look forward to styling it for the holidays. Read more
items.author: Lucy Lou

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Red-color Block, White Magenta Reindeer, White-color Block, Green Snowflake, White Black Reindeer, Green Print, Tree Red, Orange Print, Red, Red Snow Print, Tree Green, Elk Red, Pink Print. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
